name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willard Lester ENGLAND, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willard Lester ENGLAND, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joel S. Robbins, Brookhaven (court-appointed), for appellant.
Vram Nedurian, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Willard Lester ENGLAND, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Joel S. Robbins, Brookhaven (court-appointed), for appellant.
Vram Nedurian, Jr., Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
